title: [Self-Directed] Intensive Short-Term Multimedia Programming Course Using VoiceBot

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary programming comprehension and media content production experience
context.additional_context: Work-applicable, practice-focused training for current professionals utilizing personal devices in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain multimedia programming problem-solving procedures using VoiceBot with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can complete HTML5/CSS3-based interactive media projects while receiving real-time feedback through a voice interface.
Learners can propose designs for conversational learning tools applicable to educational settings based on their interactive experiences with VoiceBot.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
